Module blackjack
Package actors

Class GameActor

java.lang.Object
actors.GameActor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visualizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dealer, Player
public abstract class GameActor extends Object implements Visualizer
Abstract class that captures shared functionality between the Player and the Computer (each considered a "GameActor")
Author:
Michael Baker

  • Method Details

    • getHand

      public Card[] getHand()
      public getter function that returns an array of the cards the actor is holding
      Returns:
      array of Card objects that contain the cards in the GameActor's hand
      precondition
      - expects no input
      postcondition
      - will always return an array of Card objects

    • setHand

      public void setHand(Card[] cards)
      Setter function for a game actor's cards - only called once to assign the first two cards to the hands of the players
      Parameters:
      cards - - array of cards to make the current hand of the GameActor
      precondition
      - expects an array of Card objects
      postcondition
      - has no return - assigns the cards to the GameActor

    • setDealingMachine

      public void setDealingMachine(DealingMachine DM)
      Setter function to assign a game actor to a dealing machine for the game
      Parameters:
      DM - - DealingMachine object representing a stack with a deck of cards
      precondition
      - Expects an active (not null) DealingMachine reference
      postcondition
      - Has no return

    • reason

      public void reason()
      function that will be overwritten by inheriting classes based off of their logic.
